res:
['Increase the innodb_buffer_pool_size parameter to utilize more memory for caching data and reducing disk I/O',
 'Increase the innodb_io_capacity parameter to allow more I/O operations to be processed simultaneously',
 'Increase the innodb_flush_method parameter to O_DIRECT to bypass the operating system cache and write directly to disk',
 'Consider increasing the innodb_log_file_size parameter to improve write performance',
 'Enable the innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit parameter to 1 to ensure durability of transactions',
 'Consider enabling the innodb_flush_neighbors parameter to reduce disk seeks for adjacent pages',
 'Monitor and adjust the innodb_read_io_threads and innodb_write_io_threads parameters to optimize I/O performance',
 'Consider upgrading to the m2.4xlarge instance type for higher network performance and potentially better I/O performance']
